## Bee.reuploadPinnedData() method

Instructs the Bee node to reupload a locally pinned data into the network.

**Signature:**

```typescript
reuploadPinnedData(postageBatchId: BatchId | Uint8Array | string, reference: Reference | Uint8Array | string, options?: BeeRequestOptions): Promise<void>;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

</td><td>

</td><td>


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

reference


</td><td>

[Reference](./bee-js-docs-project.reference.md) \| Uint8Array \| string


</td><td>

Bee data reference to be re-uploaded in hex string (either 64 or 128 chars long) or ENS domain.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[BeeRequestOptions](./bee-js-docs-project.beerequestoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Options that affects the request behavior


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

BeeArgumentError if the reference is not locally pinned

TypeError if some of the input parameters is not expected type

BeeArgumentError if there is passed ENS domain with invalid unicode characters
